titleStmt.title: Humarec Manuscript Viewer - Marciana Gr. Z. 11 (379)

availability.p: Visit the Humarec Homepage for more information.

msContents.summary: Marciana Gr. Z 11 (379) contains the Acts, the Catholic letters and the letters of Paul in Greek, Latin and Arabic. This is the only trilingual Greek, Latin and Arabic manuscriptin the GA list. The manuscript is not dated but was estimated to the 12th or 13th century. It comes probably from Sicily.

msItem.title: Catholic Letters
msItem.note: Argumenta and tabula capitum precede each letter.

msItem.title: Letters of Paul
msItem.note: With the exception of 1 Corinthians, argumenta and tabula capitum precede each letter.
